content: प्रहत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Wounded, killed, slain. {@--2@} Beaten, struck (as a drum); स स्वयं प्रहतपुष्करः कृती <ls>R. 19. 14</ls>; <ls>Me. 64.</ls> {@--3@} Repulsed, overcome, defeated. {@--4@} Spread, expanded. {@--5@} Contiguous. {@--6@} Beaten, frequented (as a track). {@--7@} Accomplished, learned.
